Petal_Display: Functions to Petal sensor by ELECFREAKS Co.,Ltd.
Petal_Display.NeoPixelMode: Different modes for RGB or RGB+W NeoPixel strips
Petal_Display.Strip.clear:
Turn off all LEDs.
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
Petal_Display.Strip.range|param|length: number of LEDs in the range. eg: 4
Petal_Display.Strip.range|param|start: offset in the LED strip to start the range
Petal_Display.Strip.rotate:
Rotate LEDs forward.
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
Petal_Display.Strip.rotate|param|offset: number of pixels to rotate forward, eg: 1
Petal_Display.Strip.setBrightness: Set the brightness of the strip. This flag only applies to future operation.
Petal_Display.Strip.setBrightness|param|: a measure of LED brightness in 0-255. eg: 255
Petal_Display.Strip.setPin: Set the pin where the neopixel is connected, defaults to P0.
Petal_Display.Strip.setPixelColor:
Set LED to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b).
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
Petal_Display.Strip.setPixelColor|param|: position of the NeoPixel in the strip
Petal_Display.Strip.shift:
Shift LEDs forward and clear with zeros.
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
Petal_Display.Strip.shift|param|offset: number of pixels to shift forward, eg: 1
Petal_Display.Strip.show: Send all the changes to the strip.
Petal_Display.Strip.showColor: Shows all LEDs to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b).
Petal_Display.Strip.showRainbow: Shows a rainbow pattern on all LEDs.
Petal_Display.Strip.showRainbow|param|en: the end hue value for the rainbow, eg: 360
Petal_Display.Strip.showRainbow|param|st: the start hue value for the rainbow, eg: 1
Petal_Display.TM1637LEDs._dat: set data to TM1637, with given bit
Petal_Display.TM1637LEDs.showNumber: Show a 4 digits number on display
Petal_Display.TM1637LEDs.showbit: Show a single number from 0 to 9 at a specified digit of Grove - 4-Digit Display
Petal_Display.colors: Gets the RGB value of a known color
Petal_Display.create: Create a new NeoPixel driver for `numleds` LEDs.
Petal_Display.create|param|numleds: number of leds in the strip, eg: 24,30,60,64
Petal_Display.hsl: Converts a hue saturation luminosity value into a RGB color
Petal_Display.rgb: Converts red, green, blue channels into a RGB color
Petal_Display.rgb|param|blue: value of the blue channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
Petal_Display.rgb|param|green: value of the green channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
Petal_Display.rgb|param|red: value of the red channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
Petal_Display.tm1637Create: Create a new driver Grove - 4-Digit Display
Petal_IOT.brokerState: Check if ESP8266 successfully connected to mqtt broker
Petal_IOT.smartiotState: Check if ESP8266 successfully connected to SmartIot
Petal_IOT.setData: Connect to ThingSpeak and set data.
Petal_IOT.thingSpeakState: Check if ESP8266 successfully connected to ThingSpeak
Petal_IOT.uploadData: upload data. It would not upload anything if it failed to connect to Wifi or ThingSpeak.
Petal_IOT.wifiState: Check if ESP8266 successfully connected to Wifi
Petal_Basic.TrackBit_get_offset: Gets the position offset.The range is from -3000 to 3000.
Petal_Basic.TrackbitgetGray: Get gray value.The range is from 0 to 255.
